title: Blueprint, "Frederick B. Patterson Apartment: Foyer", 1931
inscribed: Inscribed in blueprint, lower left: LAYOUT OF FOYER/DECORATOR WILL/FURNISH & ERECT/STEEL BRICKS (?)/METAL & WOOD DOOR FRAMES/? TRIM AND BASE/METAL STRIPPING/HARDWARE & SADDLES/CORE REFLECTOR LIGHTS, JC STEWART WILL/FURNISH & ERECT/ROUGH PARTITIONS/PLASTER WALLS & CEILINGS/CONCRETE BASE TO RECEIVE F?/MARBLE FL. ALLOW ? TO FIN./WIRING TO REFLECTOR COVE FOR/SPECIAL LIGHTING; below: ENTRY/DOOR TO FOYER/INCLUDING HARDWARE/SADDLE E?, FLUSH JAMBS AT ELEV./TERRAZZO FLOOR (NEW DESIGN)/ROUGH WALLS AND FINISH PLASTER; below: HALLS/WOOD BASE/DOOR KNOBS &/ESCUTCHEONS, ROUGH WALLS-/PLASTER WALLS & CEILING/RELIANCE FLUSH JAMBS/FLUSH TYPE BOOKS WITH/OLIVE KNUCKLE HINGES; inscribed in blueprint, lower right: DONALD DESKEY/145 WEST 57TH STREET/NEW YORK CITY/JOB FWP/DRWG # 330316; dimensions, materials, instructions in graphite
description: Plans and detail drawings for foyer.

tombstone.epitaph: Blueprint, "Frederick B. Patterson Apartment: Foyer", 1931.Blueprint on white wove paper. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1975-11-1010.
